page.title: 08HOUSING AND HOMES IN BUNGAY
page.content: A survey of 90 homes on the St Margarets Estate showed that most people had moved twice.The majority of the house holders are under 24,98% have children,99% shop locally at least once a week.The houses are 2,3 and 4 bedroomed. Dunelm house is for termly boarders who attend schools in Bungay.22 boys aged 9-18 live there.The house is owened by Mr and Mrs May. 100 children were asked about their homes,27% live on estates,40% live in a village,33% live in Bungay town,64% live in a detatched house,23% live in terraced houses,3% live in flats.51% live in modern houses,23% live in houses which are dated between 1900-1950,15% live in Victorian houses and 11% live in pre-Victorian houses.
